column1: in memory of tammi lynn jacks critcher -- hixson brothers| born: july 25
column5: la tammi lynn jacks critcher. july 25
column7: 2015 send card. memorial services for tammi lynn jacks critcher will be held at 6:00 p. m.
column10: 2015 in the chapel of hixson brothers
column11: alexandria with pastor nathan martin officiating. the family requests that visitation be observed sunday at hixson brothers
column12: alexandria from 4:00 p. m. until 6:00 p. m. tammi
column16: 2015 at christus st. frances cabrini hospital. she received her bachelors degree from nsu and was currently working towards her masters degree through nsu. she was employed at discovery house for 19 years
column17: with 12 of those years being the director. she started her dream job on june 8
column18: 2015 at nsu as a childhood development instructor. she loved children and devoted her life to them. she was kindhearted
column20: hard-working and an amazing mother to her boys
column21: and countless other children she watched grow throughout her career. tammi loved spending time traveling and seeing the country with her family. she was preceded in death by her father
column22: george leonard jacks. those left to cherish her memory include the love of her life
column24: evan critcher and aaron critcher; mother
column33: jennifer jacks. in lieu of flowers a fund has been made for her children in her memory: gofundme. com
